message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be a great fit for you.  I'm asking $20,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you consider that?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $18,000 due to the value this product offers. Would you be willing to meet me somewhere in the middle?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. I'd be willing to meet you at $15,000. Can you consider that?
